it.catchword.entity

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.catchword.entity.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the current state of the board of the game. So it keeps track of the words in the different holes and permits to generate new words or to remove older ones.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(long seed)
      The constructor initializes the board and call the constructor of Dictionary.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLength()
      This method will return the length of the board.
      java.lang.String getWord(int index)
      This method will return the word at the hole in index passed.
      void removeWord(int index)
      This method will set the word at index passed to empty string.
      void removeWord(java.lang.String word) 
      int spawnWord()
      This method will trigger the spawn of the next word on board.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(long seed)
        The constructor initializes the board and call the constructor of Dictionary.
        Parameters:
        seed - The seed utilized for the random initialization of Dictionary

    • Method Detail

      • getLength

        public int getLength()
        This method will return the length of the board. The meaning of 'length' is the number of words currently present on it.
        Returns:
        The number of the words currently present on the board.

      • getWord

        public java.lang.String getWord(int index)
        This method will return the word at the hole in index passed.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the wanted word.
        Returns:
        The word indexed by @param index.

      • removeWord

        public void removeWord(int index)
        This method will set the word at index passed to empty string.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the word to remove

      • removeWord

        public void removeWord(java.lang.String word)

      • spawnWord

        public int spawnWord()
        This method will trigger the spawn of the next word on board.
        Returns:
        The index of the new spawned word.
